metadata.title: Seasonal Mesoplankton Biomass Variations in the Surface Layer of the Bering Sea and the Northwest Pacific
metadata.description:
Statistical analysis of 1950-1953 data on the biomass of mesoplankton shows
     biomass variations over the range 770 Mg/m super(3) in summer to 74 mg/m
     super(3) in winter with an annual average of 240 mg/m super(3). These values
     are in good agreement with seasonal variations observed at ocean weather
     station "P" in the Northeast Pacific (50 degree N, 145 degree W) over the
     period of 1954-1964.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: to report the seasonal mesoplankton biomass variations in the surface layer of the Bering Sea and the Northwest Pacific.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
